name: tropicana-cenang
title: TROPICANA CENANG
description: A natural paradise, Langkawi is perhaps unmatched anywhere else in Southeast Asia. Its beautiful geological heritage of stunning landscapes and unique rock formations earns Langkawi an UNESCO Geopark status. Fine beaches, pure emerald waters, and rich marine life offers sun-and-fun-filled holidays.
caption: AN ISLAND OF MANY ATTRACTIONS, A TREAT FOR THE SENSES.

name: natl-camp
title:
NATIONAL CAMP AND SERVICES 
 (NORTHERN REGIONS)
description: The National Services (NS) Camp (Northern Region) was constructed successfully on a very tight schedule and incorporated homely design elements for new trainees to feel comfortable in a lush forest environment.

name: mahligai
title:
MAHLIGAI AT NUSA DAMAI, 
 2 & 2.5 STOREY HOUSING, JOHOR
description: The idea behind Mahligai is a series of attractively designed terrace homes nestled in the flourishing township of Nusa Damai. So near to Pasir Gudang and Johor Bahru yet cocooned in its own bubble of greenery and tranquillity, it is surrounded by all the amenities and convenience of a mature neighborhood. Here youâ€™ll find the perfect modern residence with all the space you and your family need to enjoy life, all at an affordable price. A great place to come home to every day.
caption: A HAVEN OF TRANQUILITY IN A THRIVING TOWNSHIP. WELCOME HOME.
